SEARCH
Package server.Server

Class Server.ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
server.Server.Server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Enclosing class:
Server
public class Server.ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Inner class to handle client connections and messages.

  • Method Details

    • getSocket

      public Socket getSocket()
      Gets the socket associated with this client handler.
      Returns:
      The socket associated with this client handler.

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the client handler thread, handling incoming messages from the client.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • handle_receiving_messages

      public void handle_receiving_messages(DataInputStream input, DataOutputStream output) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Handles receiving messages from the client.
      Parameters:
      input - The input stream for receiving messages from the client.
      output - The output stream for sending messages to the client.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when reading from the input stream.
      InterruptedException - If the current thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • handle_chatWindow_request

      public int handle_chatWindow_request(String message) throws IOException
      Handles a request to open a chat window with another user.
      Parameters:
      message - The message containing the request.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the type of request.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending a message to the other user.

    • handle_sending_messages

      public void handle_sending_messages(String message) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Handles sending messages between clients and other related operations.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be processed and sent.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending a message to the target client.
      InterruptedException - If the current thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • handle_sending_messages_inner

      public void handle_sending_messages_inner(String[] tokens, String mess_string, String target_client_username) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Handles the process of sending messages internally based on the provided tokens and message string.
      Parameters:
      tokens - The tokens containing splitted message
      mess_string - The message string to be sent
      target_client_username - The username of the target client
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending or receiving data
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting

    • send_message_to_target

      public void send_message_to_target(String[] tokens) throws IOException
      Sends a message to the target client based on the provided tokens.
      Parameters:
      tokens - The tokens containing information about the message
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending or receiving data

    • handle_window_request

      public void handle_window_request(String target_client_username, String[] tokens) throws IOException
      Handles the window request for the target client.
      Parameters:
      target_client_username - The username of the target client
      tokens - The tokens containing information about the request
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending or receiving data

    • accept_request

      public void accept_request(String[] tokens, boolean first_time_chatting_between_2_users) throws IOException
      Accepts a request from a client to initiate a chat session.
      Parameters:
      tokens - The message tokens containing necessary information.
      first_time_chatting_between_2_users - Indicates if it's the first time chatting between two users.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending a message to the other client.

    • handle_unread_messages

      public void handle_unread_messages() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Handles unread messages for the client. If client gets some messages, but isn't currently online, we will send them to him/her when he/she gets online.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending a message to the client.
      InterruptedException - If the current thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • send_message

      public void send_message(String target_client_username, String mess_string) throws IOException
      Sends a message to the target client. If is client offline, than we store messages addressed to him in list of unread messages. We store them in format "username;target_username;date;message".
      Parameters:
      target_client_username - The username of the target client.
      mess_string - The message to be sent.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending a message to the target client.

    • handle_log_or_registration

      public boolean handle_log_or_registration(String message, registrator registration_handler) throws IOException
      Handles the login or registration process for the client.
      Parameters:
      message - The message containing login or registration details.
      registration_handler - The registration handler object.
      Returns:
      true If user was logged in sucessfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when sending a message to the client.
